name: Baldaquin II
description:
The long awaited sequel of Baldaquin has finally arrived ! 


[b]ZQSD Keys shown in game are from a french keyboard, note that WASD works perfectly too.[/b] 

This time, you only get one ball... for two ! 

This is a two player game that can be played solo, but it's far less interesting and intense. 

To win, you need to destroy the sequoias. 
Upgrade the power of your ball a few time to do so.
